Configuration.startupLisp:
;(setj WorldObjects:MaintainCollisions true) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainCollisions false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainEffects true) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainActions true) (setj GridAddress "http://osgrid.org:8002/") (setj StartLoc "uri:last&173&51&38") (setj GlobalPasswd "foobar")
'(create-botclient "Nephrael" "Rae" GlobalPasswd "https://login.agni.lindenlab.com/cgi-bin/login.cgi" "uri:Fairyverse&115&125&21") '(create-botclient "Douglas" "Miles" GlobalPasswd GridAddress "uri:DaxlandWest&173&51&90") '(create-botclient "Douglas" "Miles" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc) ' (create-botclient "Nephrael" "Rae" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc ) '(create-botclient "Lisa" "Wooley" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc ) '(create-botclient "Cat" "Bot" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc ) '(create-botclient "Nephrael" "Rajesh" GlobalPasswd GridAddress) '(create-botclient "Jon" "Doe" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc)
' (create-botclient "Second" "Bot" "nonDefaultPassword" "http://71.197.210.170:9000/") ' (create-botclient "Third" "Bot" ) ' (create-botclient "Fourth" "Bot" ) ' (create-botclient "Fifth" "Bot" ) ' (create-botclient "Sixth" "Bot" )
Configuration.startupClientLisp: (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load CogbotRadegastPluginModule") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load AIMLBotModule") ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load CycWorldModule") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load TheSimiansModule") ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load IrcRegionModule") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "login") ;; does the login (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread setmaster Nephrael Rajesh") ;; change this to your name (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread setmaster Douglas Miles") ;; change this to your name ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread irc #logicmoo cogbotIRCModule irc.freenode.net") ;; to connect to IRC (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml off") ;; turns on/off aiml for all users
